general.list_iso_rtl: ISO Codes list for RTL languages:
general.list_iso_rtl_info: Separate each language ISO code with a ','. eg: ar, ha, he
general.list_iso_rtl_note: List out language ISO codes to automatically switch to RTL layout: ar:(Arabic); dv:(Dhivehi,Maldivian); ha:(Hausa); he:(Hebrew); ku:(Kurdish/Sorani); fa:(Persian/Farsi); ur:(Urdu); ps:(Pashto); yi:(Yiddish)

share.info__2: A store title and description are included with the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/promoting-marketing/seo/adding-keywords#set-a-title-and-description-for-your-online-store).

customization-option.info: Uncheck this if you don't want the captured information to be shown in the order summary on the checkout pages.

paragraph__1.content: Customization Options are used to collect customization information for an item added to the cart. This information can be collected from the buyer on the product page and quick view.

settings.info_1: * Only avaiable for store has Shopify Payments. Link [here](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/payments/shopify-payments/multi-currency/setup)
settings.info_2: Don't choose all 3 options at the same time or combine Shopify payment with others. Link [here](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/payments/shopify-payments/multi-currency/setup)
settings.paragraph_1: Separate your currency codes with a space. Use the ISO 4217 3-letter currency code. Click [here](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php) for a complete list of currency codes. Example: CAD USD.
settings.paragraph_2: * For this functionality to work in your shop, you are required to edit your money formats as per [these instructions](http://help.shopify.com/en/themes/customization/currencies) (“Do tell where the money is”).

settings.info__1: Bounding Box is to describe a particular area of a map (Southwestern and Northeastern of the area) in which you want to support to find the nearest store. The bounding box can spread over 1 or more countries. If no bounding box is entered, the default value will be the bounding for USA (-171.791110603, 18.91619, -66.96466, 71.3577635769). To find the bounding box of your area, please preference to this link: https://gist.github.com/graydon/11198540 or https://boundingbox.klokantech.com/
